title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3534/86 of 20 November 1986 introducing a derogation from Regulations (EEC) No 1871/86, (EEC) No 2040/86 and (EEC) No 2096/86 on exemption from the co-responsibility levy on cereals
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3534/86
of 20 November 1986
introducing a derogation from Regulations (EEC) No 1871/86, (EEC) No 2040/86 and (EEC) No 2096/86 on exemption from the co-responsibility levy on cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 November 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
